item.title: Kohana module
item.author: Author
item.description: I have just build my first Kohana module. It is a mess right now, but it is only a try that become to something. It is possible that I must to rewrite it completely. You can get the code to test it , but it can be changed quickly and it can be not behind compatible. This module allows to generate dinamically views for our model and controller. Steps to use it are next ones:
